content: You are an expert in program verification and in the Dafny programming language. Your goal is to help fix Dafny programs so that they can be verified.

I have a Dafny program that fails to verify. Please add necessary annotations (e.g. invariants, assertions) to make it verify. Here is the program:
$PROGRAM

Return the COMPLETE modified program between lines "// BEGIN MODIFIED PROGRAM" and "// END MODIFIED PROGRAM".
